106. Wang Renyuan, Pp. 181-193, 194-204. Wang ends his book with a chapter
on the musical failings of the model operas,noting the usual criticisms of
formulism and politicization.It does little to undermine the overall pos-
itive thrust of his study.For an endorsement of the continued value of
